TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XPathMessageQueryCollection extends System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageQueryCollection

span.span: Contains a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关消息查询的更多信息，请参见 和 类。For more information about message queries, see the and classes. ## Examples 以下示例创建一个消息和 XPath 消息查询。The following example creates a message and XPath message queries. 这些查询由 对象中包含的 对象进行评估。The queries are evaluated by the objects contained in an object. 使用 类的 属性测试每个查询的结果。The results of each query are tested using the property of the class.
